name: Pomeranians IO
description:
POMERANIANS IO

Pomeranians IO is a fun, fast, canine property trading game that celebrates all Pomeranians. Play against your friend, friends, or AI (Artificial Intelligence). Spin, buy, and sell as you race around the Pomeranians IO board. Every time you buy the same color board spaces you achieve Pomeranians IO. The richest player wins the game!
